001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.product;
003
004import com.commercetools.api.models.Referencable;
005
006public interface ByIdVariantIdentifier extends VariantIdentifier {
007    String getProductId();
008
009    Integer getVariantId();
010
011    static ByIdVariantIdentifier of(final Referencable<Product> product, final Integer variantId) {
012        return of(product.toReference().getId(), variantId);
013    }
014
015    static ByIdVariantIdentifier of(final String productId, final Integer variantId) {
016        return new VariantIdentifierImpl(productId, variantId, null);
017    }
018}
